first.product_desc: I am a passionate and driven Graphic Designer and Print/Electronic Production specialist with over 10 years of experience creating visually stunning and engaging designs. Currently, I am a student at Fanshawe College in London, Ontario, pursuing my passion for Interactive Media Design. I am expected to complete my program and graduate in  April 2023.

second.product_desc: After completing my studies in Computer Science at AMA University, I initially pursued a career in programming. However, as I started working, I discovered my passion for Graphic Design and began developing my skills in this field. In response to the Covid-19 pandemic and the resulting disruptions, I made the decision to return to academic studies. I am currently enrolled in the Interactive Media Design program at Fanshawe College in Canada, where I am honing my skills and knowledge to further advance my career in the design industry.

third.product_desc: In my design process, I employ various software tools such as Illustrator, XD, and Cinema 4D, depending on the project requirements. I leverage my expertise in Photoshop and After Effects to add the finishing touches to my designs. In terms of front-end development, I have extensive experience with JavaScript, both as a standalone language and as a component of popular frameworks such as GreenSock and VueJS. While I was initially drawn to CSS, I find that SASS has revolutionized my development process and has become an essential tool in my skill set.

fourth.product_desc:
STAR INC. - GRAPHIC DESIGNER/VIDEO EDITING
DENTSU PHILIPPINES - DIGITAL IMAGING ARTIST/FREELANCER
SUSHI GRAPHICS -DIGITAL IMAGING ARTIST/RETOUCHER
